titleStmt.title: Catalogus vniversalis pro nundinis Francofurtensi[bus] vernalibus, de anno M.DC.XX hoc est, designatio omnium libror[um], qui hisce nundinis vernalibus, vel noui, vel emendatiores & auctiores prodierunt.

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 36 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 7 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal licence. The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

seriesStmt.title: Early English books online text creation partnership.

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from: (Early English Books Online ; image set 27725)
Images scanned from microfilm: (Early English books, 1475-1640 ; 1852:3)

titleStmt.title: Catalogus vniversalis pro nundinis Francofurtensi[bus] vernalibus, de anno M.DC.XX hoc est, designatio omnium libror[um], qui hisce nundinis vernalibus, vel noui, vel emendatiores & auctiores prodierunt.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: lacks all but portions of signatures A and C; creased, stained and torn, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

projectDesc.p: Created by converting TCP files to TEI P5 using tcp2tei.xsl, TEI @ Oxford.

editorialDecl.p: EEBO-TCP is a partnership between the Universities of Michigan and Oxford and the publisher ProQuest to create accurately transcribed and encoded texts based on the image sets published by ProQuest via their Early English Books Online (EEBO) database (http://eebo.chadwyck.com). The general aim of EEBO-TCP is to encode one copy (usually the first edition) of every monographic English-language title published between 1473 and 1700 available in EEBO.

EEBO-TCP aimed to produce large quantities of textual data within the usual project restraints of time and funding, and therefore chose to create diplomatic transcriptions (as opposed to critical editions) with light-touch, mainly structural encoding based on the Text Encoding Initiative (http://www.tei-c.org).

The EEBO-TCP project was divided into two phases. The 25,363 texts created during Phase 1 of the project have been released into the public domain as of 1 January 2015. Anyone can now take and use these texts for their own purposes, but we respectfully request that due credit and attribution is given to their original source.
Users should be aware of the process of creating the TCP texts, and therefore of any assumptions that can be made about the data.

Text selection was based on the New Cambridge Bibliography of English Literature (NCBEL). If an author (or for an anonymous work, the title) appears in NCBEL, then their works are eligible for inclusion. Selection was intended to range over a wide variety of subject areas, to reflect the true nature of the print record of the period. In general, first editions of a works in English were prioritized, although there are a number of works in other languages, notably Latin and Welsh, included and sometimes a second or later edition of a work was chosen if there was a compelling reason to do so.

Image sets were sent to external keying companies for transcription and basic encoding. Quality assurance was then carried out by editorial teams in Oxford and Michigan. 5% (or 5 pages, whichever is the greater) of each text was proofread for accuracy and those which did not meet QA standards were returned to the keyers to be redone. After proofreading, the encoding was enhanced and/or corrected and characters marked as illegible were corrected where possible up to a limit of 100 instances per text. Any remaining illegibles were encoded as <gap>s. Understanding these processes should make clear that, while the overall quality of TCP data is very good, some errors will remain and some readable characters will be marked as illegible. Users should bear in mind that in all likelihood such instances will never have been looked at by a TCP editor.
The texts were encoded and linked to page images in accordance with level 4 of the TEI in Libraries guidelines.

Copies of the texts have been issued variously as SGML (TCP schema; ASCII text with mnemonic sdata character entities); displayable XML (TCP schema; characters represented either as UTF-8 Unicode or text strings within braces); or lossless XML (TEI P5, characters represented either as UTF-8 Unicode or TEI g elements).

Full documentation of the original data capture process is available from the Text Creation Partnership web site. All versions of the texts are now archived and freely available for download. See the TCP Download FAQ for detailed information. The TEI P5 versions are also freely available from the TCP Github repository.

revisionDesc.change: 2009-12 SPi GlobalKeyed and coded from ProQuest page images
2014-10 John LattaText and markup reviewed and edited

div.p: CATALOGVS VNIVERSALIS PRO NVNDINIS FRANCOFVRTENSI •… VERNALIBVS, DE ANNO M.DC.XX.
Hoc est: DESIGNATIO OMNIVM LIBROR QVI HISCE NVNDINIS VERNALIbus, vel noui, vel emendatiores & auctiores prodierunt.
Cum Gratia & Priuilegio Sac. Caes. Maiest.
LONDINI, Ex Officina Societatis Bibliopolarum. 1620.

div.head: Protestantium.
div.p:
MEditatio in cap. 27. Euangelij S. Mat. v. 27, 28, 29. siue hypotyposis inaugurationis regiae, autore serenissimo 〈◊〉
• otentissimo principe, Iacob. D.G. magnae Britanniae, Franciae & Hiberniae 〈◊〉 Londini apud Billios, in 8.

Methodus Catechetica, id est, dispositiones Analyticae Ca •••••• Palatino-Bipontini, tabellis synopticis memoriae causa comprehensae, atque ita a •••
natae, vt concionibus formandis accommodari possint, autore Ioan. Henrico Extero, Herborn. ap. Coruin. in 4.
Acta & scripta synodalia Dordracena ministrorum Remonstrantium in foederato Belgio. Prostat Francofurti apud M. Leonhard. Burck. in 4.

Ioannis Buxtorfij, Tiberias, siue commentarius Masorethicus triplex, Historicus, Didacticus, Criticus, ad illustrationem operis Biblici Basileensis conscriptus, quo primum historia Masoretharum Tiberensium, siue à quibus Masora conscripta sit, excutitur, quid item tractet, quae eius methodus, & quo fine inuenta sit, amplè explicatur: Secundo clauis Masorae traditur, per quam ad maxima & minima Masorae penitus cognoscenda, facilimus datur aditus: Tertio castigationes innumerorum mendorum per vniuersam Masoram proponuntur. Basileae apud Ludouicum Konig. in fol. & 4.

Ioan. Georg. Grossi. SS. th. D. compendium quatuor facultatum. 1. Philosophiae. 2. Medicinae. 3. Iurisprudentiae. 4. Theologiae S. non nisi communia tradens principia, quae simul semelque sumpta, omnium facultatum studiofis inprimis autem S. Theologiae Canditatis, scitu necessaria sunt, ad scripturam S. rectè intelligendam, ibid. in 8.
Ioannis Crocij SS. th. D. & Professoris Marpurgensis conuersationis Prutenicae pars secunda, Marpurgi apud Rodolph. Hutwelck. in 8.
Theoria theologica, de religionis Catholico orthodoxae natura & proprietatibus methodice cōscripta à M. Ioachimo Mēcelio Freistat. Silesio, Berolini ap. Io. Celliū 8.
Compendium theologiae sacrae tripartitum, vereque methodicum, autore Ioanne Georgio Grossio SS. th. Doctore, Basileae apud. Lud. Konig. in 8.

Eiusdem compendium Iurisprudentiae, non nisi ea tradens rudimenta, quae ad scripturam sacram (inprimis autem ad Mosaicam decalogi legem) rectè intelligendam, explicandam, vindicandamque accommodata sunt, ibidem in 8.
Analysis Methodica Typica Euangeliorum Dominicalium & Festalium, autore M. Iacobo Brandmyllero, ibidem in 4.
Eiusdem series locorum communium theologicorum prior, ex symbolo Apostolico, ibidem in 4.
Eiusdem series locorum communium theologicorum, altera ex decalogo, cui su • ijcitur index omnium locorum communium theologicorum in vtraque serie •• tentorum alphabeticus, ibid. in 4.

Anatome Arminianismi, seu Enucleatio controuersiarum, quae i • Belgio agitantur, super doctrina de prouidentia, de praedestinatione, de moite Christi, de natura & gratia, autore Petro Molinaeo pastore Ecclesiae Parisiensis. Parisijs apud Abraham, Pecard. & Lugduni Batauorum apud Iacob. Marcum in 4. Prostat apud eundem, translat •
〈◊〉 Belgicam in 4.

〈…〉
•• itation • Christi, ex fontibus 〈…〉 scripturae, excerpti 〈…〉
autore Thoma de Kempes Germano, Bremae apud Viller. in 12.
In Nahumum Prophetam commentarius, Ludouici Crocij SS. th. D. ibid. in 12.

Homo Caluinianus impiè descriptus, & fundamentum quo demonstrationes in Enchiridio XVII. famosorum articulorum reformatis Ecclesijs obiectae, nituntur improbè positum à D. Matthi •
••• e, incisum & subrutum per Ludou. Crocium SS. Th. D. ibid. in 8.

Th ••
•• ata theologica de vulneribus Ecclesiae Romanae necdum curatis, & alijs quibusdam religionis capitibus, instituta à Wolffgango Meyero SS. Th. Doctore, Basileae apud Ioh. Iacobum Genathium, in 8.
Concordantia Bibliorum vtriusque Testamenti veteris & noui, Geneuae apud Samuelem Crispinum, in fol.
Festum Azymorum dictum Pascha, Luc. 22. v. 1. quod ponderandum proponit Regnerus Barels, Francofurti apud Luc. Iennis, in 4.

Censura vulgatae atque à Tridentinis Canonizatae versionis V. liberorum Moysis, vbi non tantum centeni aliquot errores deteguntur, ex fontibus antiquorum interpp. Graecorum & Chaldeorum collatione, collectisque ipsorum Papistarum confessionibus conuelluntur, sed & quid difficilioribus in locis tenendum sit docetur, autore Sixtino Amama Frisio litt. Hebr. in illust. Frisiae ordinum Academia Professore, ibid. in 4.

Declaratio dominorum ordinum Hollandiae & Westphrisiae, qua abrogant decretum nomine ipsorum editum anno 1614. 17. Octobr. contra quendam librum, qui indigitatur Sibrandi Lubberti responsio ad pietatem Hugonis Crotij, ibid. in 4.
Theologia Polemica, exhibens praecipuas huius aeui in religionis negotio controuersias, autore Ioan. Henrico Alstedio, Hanouiae apud Petrum Antonium, in 4.
Noui Testamenti Catholica expositio ecclesiastica ex probatis theologis excerpta, autore Augustino Marlorato: Editio septima, Heidelb. apud viduam Ioan. Commelini, in fol.
Sacrae conciones in 150. Psalmos Dauidis, & aliorum sanctorum Prophetarum in Ecclesia Bernensi habitae à Stephano Fabritio pastore ibidem. Geneuae apud Petr. & Iacob. Chouet. in fol.
Antonij Sadeelis, opera theologica, ibid. in fol.
Cursus theologicus, in quo controuersiae omnes de fidei dogmatibus hoc seculo agitatae nominatim inter nos & Pontificios pertractantur, autore Dn. M. Ioanne Scharpio SS. Th. Doctore, ibid. in 4.
Bartholomaei Pitisci & Abrahami Sculteti meletemata psalmica, siue idea concionum in Psalmos Dauidis confecta, opera M. Ioannis Adami Rudewaldensis, Francofurti apud haeredes. Ionae Rosae, in 4.
Abrahami Sculteti delitiae Euangelicae Pragenses, hoc est, obseruationes Grammaticae, historicae, Theologicae, in historiam Iesu Christinati, educati, baptizati, tentati, ibidem apud Aubrios, in 8.
De sacra Philosophia, siue de ijs quae Physice scripta sunt in libris sacris, Francisci Valesij Couarruibam liber singularis, ibidem in 8.

Harmonia confessionis fidei, & institutionum Christianarum siue locorum communium thesaurus, controuersiam illam nobilem, de visibili monarchia Ecclesiae & fide illustrans, Francofurti apud Hulsium in 8.

Iudicium Synodi 〈◊〉 reformatar •• Ecclesiatum Belgicarum hab •••
drechti, A 〈10 letters〉 & 1619. Francofurti apud Ioan. Carol. Vnckel. in 4.

Vindicatio locorum V. Testamenti, aeternam Deitatem filij & spiritus S. mysteriumque SS. Trinitatis confirmantium, aduersus Georgium Eniedinum instituta à Benedicto M. Szentkirali Transyluano, ibid. in 8.

Ioannis Crocij Th. D. conuersationis Prutenicae pars secunda, qua Prutenica fidei Catholicae inquisitio piè consideratur, reformatarum Ecclesiarum cum Augustana confessione & eius apologia consensus clarè ostenditur, &c. ibid. in 8.
Assertio bonae fidei aduersus praecipuas Heriberti Rosweidi Iesuitae Strophas. Sedani apud Ioannem Iannon, prostat Francof. apud Ionae Rosae haeredes, in 8.
Acta Synodi nationalis Dordrechti habitae, Anno 1618. & 1619. Lugduni Batau. apud Elzeuirium in fol. & 4.

CAtechesis Apostolica, hoc est, S. Apostoli Pauli Epistola ad Romanos, commentario perspicuo illustrata, autore Friderico Baldwino, SS. Th. Doct. Professore, Pastore, ac superintendente in Acad. Witebergensi. Witebergae apud haeredes Samuelis Seelfisch, in 4.

Eiusdem solida refutatio Catechismi Ariani, qui Rackouiae in Polonia, Anno 1608. excusus, & antiquissimae Apostolicae confessioni Ecclesiae Christianae de Iesu Christi persona & officio oppositus est, ibid. apud Paul. Helwig. in 8.
Eiusdem collegium SS. Trinitatis, seu disputationum theologicarum Dodecas, de arduo mysterio SS. Trinitatis, potissimum Photinianorum recentium mataeologiae opposita, ibid. in 4.

Eiusdem disputationes tredecim pro Aureolo visitationis Misnicae libello, in quo articuli quatuor, cardinem salutis nostrae concernentes. 1. de coena Domini. 2. de persona Christi. 3. de Baptismo. 4. de praedestinatione ad vitam, compendiosè per thesin & antithesm explicantur, ibid. Apud Ioan. Gorman, in 4.

Exercitationes Academicae priuatae, in quibus quatuor theologicae controuersiae, de omni praesentia carnis Christi, de sacramentis in genere, & in specie de Baptismo, & Coena Dominica, considerantur, simulque argumenta Caluinianorum confessioni Heluetianae in Vngaria addictorum, breuiter examinantur, autore Nicol. Galgocino, ibid. in 8.
Psalterium Dauidicum Logico-Rhetorica analysi illustratum à M. Iacobo Sculteto Crosna-Silesio, ibid. apud Zachar. Schurer, in 8.

〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 Theologica, quae sit harmonia Euangelistarum in historia mulierum Paschali, citra cuiusque contumeliam, eximiorum Theologorum exacto iudicio, necnon studiosae iuuentuti in Academijs Lutheranis operam danti ad considerandum proposita à Gabriele Rechan pastore in Werbig & Graefendorf, ibidem in 4.
Balthasaris Mentzeri SS. Th. Doctoris exegesis Augustanae confessionis: editio vltima & castigatissima, Giessae apud Hampelium in 12.

Eiusdem disputationes nouem Anti-Steinianae, quibus examinatur defensio concionis Irenicae à Paulo Steinio in illustrissima aula Cassellana pastore 22. Iunij Anno 1618. Cassellis habitae, de fundamentali Lutheranorum & Caluinistarum in Christiana religione consensu, & mutua inter eos fraternitate concilianda, ibidem in 〈◊〉 .

Eiusdem breue examen breuis responsionis Ioannis Appelij pa ••
〈◊〉
• gensis, ad breue iudicium de illius longa censura, ibid in 4.

Meditationes Propheticae ex Psalmis Dauidis duobus, nimirum 76. & 77. Item ex • rima parte duodecimi capitis Danielis, autore M. Ioanne Andrea Waldh. Harmund. Pastore in regia Cadana Bohemiae. Lipsiae apud Gotofr. Gros. in 8.

Locorum theologicorū, cum pro astruenda veritate, tum pro destruenda quorumuis contradicentium falsitate, per theses neruosè, solidè, & copiosè explicatorum tomus septimus, autore Ioanne Gerhardo SS. th. D. Ienae apud Tobiam Steinman in 4.
Eiusdem Aphorismi theologici, quibus controuersiae tum textuales, tum doctrinales in Genesi Mosaica occurrentes, summatim continentur. ibid. in 8.
Eiusdem disputationes synopticae, in quibus dogmata Papalia iuxta seriem à Rob. Bellarmino obseruatam succinctè expenduntur, ibid. in 8.
Meditationes sacrae in Euangelia Dominicalia, conscriptae per Balthasarum Meisnerum SS. th. Doct. Witebergae apud Casparum Heiden. in 8.
Eiusdem breuis consideratio theologiae Photinianae, ibid. in 8.
Disputationes Anti-Photinianae, I. de primo hominis statu ante lapsum, II. de lapsu primi hominis. III. de peccato originali, autore Nicol. Hunnio SS. th. D. ib. in. 4.

〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , hoc est, consideratio argumentorum, quae in specie Martinus Becanus Iesuita, sub inani praetextu consensus cuiusdam Caluinistici, in articulo gratuitae iustificationis hominis peccatoris coram Deo, contra fidei orthodoxos Doctores proponere & astruere fludet, autore Ioanne Gisenio SS. th. Doct. & Profess. in Acad. Argentoratensi. Argentinae apud Ioan. Carolum, in 4.
Scholae Melanchthonis doctrina sana & orthodoxa de Christo filio Dei & hominis, olim collecta per studiosos quosdam Academiae Witeb. Francof. ap. Io. Eichhorn. 12.

Tyrannidis Pontificiae secularis demonstratio apologetica, calumniarum ac ineptiarum nebulis, quibus Adamus Contzius Iesuita Moguntinus solem huius veritatis in palma seculari Lutherano-Euangelica detectae obnubilare est conatus, opposita à M. • igismundo Euenio scholae Hallensis Rectore. Halae Saxonum ap. Michael. Oelschlegel, in 4.

Controuersia difficilima, de imagine Dei in primo homine, statuque innocentiae, itē de Paradiso, arbore vitae, arbore scientiae mali & boni, methodo Theologico-Scholastica explicata, autore Georgio Zeamanno SS. th. D. Augustae apud Io. Kruger in 4.

Pente-Decas Citharae Dauidicae, hoc est, quindecim psalmorum, qui graduū cognominantur, explicatio methodica, opera Ioannis Schreiteri SS. th. D. Episcopatus Misnensis superintendentis, & pastoris Wurtzensis. Lips. apud Closeman in 8.
Medulla sacrae scripturae, cuiuslibet capitis summam decastichis neruosè & artificiosè proponens, autore Beniamin Luppio SS. th. stud. Halae. Sax. apud Mich. Oelschlegel, in 4.

Nouus homo, hoc est, quo, quamque mirabili semine internus siue spiritualis homo nascatur, quo nutrimento alatur & crescat, donec tandem in vicum perfectum in Christo Iesu adolescat, Francofurti apud Iacobum de Zetter in 8.

Controuersia de personarum ianua Dei essentia pluralitate aduersus Georgium Eniedinum Photinianum agitata, in illustri Tubinga ventilata, autore Theodoro SS. th. D. & Professore ibidem, Francofurti apud Ioann. Berner. in 4.

Melchiore Shae • Ecclesiae Mentzingensis Pastore, Noribergae apud Ioh. Frid. Sartorium, in 8.

p.hi: Ioannis de Pineda Hispalensis è Soc. Ies. in Ecclesiasten Cōmentariorū liber vnus. ib. in fo.
